name: Ingetec
overview:
Our Company

Founded in 1981, INGÉTEC is known for the quality of its services relating to the building envelope (technical surveys and visual inspections, thermography, solutions to air and water infiltration and mold problems, monitoring of work, expert witness or litigation support, technical consultation, etc.) for a broad range of clients throughout eastern Canada (industrial, commercial, public and parapublic sectors, single-family and co-ownership residential).

Our team of 30 employees includes members of the ‘Ordre des technologues professionnels du Québec (OTPQ)’, of the ‘Ordre des Ingénieurs du Québec (OIQ)’ and of the AIT (Academy of Infrared Training). Our firm is also a control office for the AMCQ (Association des maîtres-couvreurs du Québec) and is a member of the ACLE (Association des consultants et laboratoires experts).

Our Projects

We have developed a strong expertise in building science, with thousands of surveys performed. Every year, and for over 300 clients (new and existing), INGÉTEC performs:

Approximately 350 building envelope surveys for problems related to degradation of components, water infiltration, presence of mold, etc. Approximately 50 thermographic surveys for problems related to water infiltrations in insulated flat roofs, air and water infiltration or poor energy performance of the building envelope

Survey of over 2 500 000 sq.ft. of roofs Monitoring of work for over 150 projects related to the building envelope (roofs and walls) Technical assistance to other professionals such as architects and engineers or property managers Court attendance as expert witnesses in construction litigation or actions for hidden defects
